summary: A new facegen for Ralof of Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab235/Wyrmskull87/Rolaf%20and%20Hadvar/RolafBanner1_zps48ac65f2.jpg[/img]
[Size=3]REQUIRES LASTEST VERSION OF SKYRIM[/size]


[color=#CDBE70]Introduction[/color]
A facelift/facegen change to Ralof of Riverwood. Just a simple face morph with a refiner beard. Made for personal reasons and uploaded to Skyrim to share. 


[color=#CDBE70]Installation[/color]
[color=#32CD32]NMM[/color] ready, Replace all. For manual install, download and drag data file to Skyrim directory -> Yes to all when asked to replace.


[color=#CDBE70]Required Mods[/color]  
There are no required mods, just install and play. For recommended mods, see below.


NOTE: Comparison shots are taken with the exact same mods installed, par this one.

[color=#CDBE70]To get Ralof to look exactly like they do in the screenshots, see the below mods:[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/?]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles - Underwear - Default by Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi V2.0b[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30411]Brows by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333]Straight hair retexture by navetsea[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29977/?]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt by Xenius[/url]
author: Amorphic87
